Text.Value: Or not hard enough.
You're supposed to be at Last Light.
Instead, I found myself cornered by shadow-fiends and in need of rescue. From you, of all bloody people.

EditorData.NodeContext: pissed off and taking it out on the player

Text.Value: Should I have left you to die?
I've failed Cal and Lia, again. Be on your way - I'll return to Last Light... I know when I'm outmatched.
What are you even doing here?
So what if I was? Cal and Lia could be there!

EditorData.NodeContext: frantic, clearly worried for his siblings

Text.Value: At least dead I'd have a purpose - perhaps as an appetiser for some cursed monster.
Please tell me you weren't looking for Moonrise.
I don't care about me, you empty-headed luddite. I came here to save Cal and Lia!

EditorData.NodeContext: frantic, clearly worried for his siblings

Text.Value: Look, your magic wasn't up to scratch and you needed saving. It happens.
I don't care about me, you jumped-up apprentice! I came here to save Cal and Lia!

EditorData.NodeContext: frantic, clearly worried for his siblings

Text.Value: Nobody asked you to!
You can't return - it's been destroyed. I'll help you find somewhere else.
You were trying to help your family - you're too hard on yourself.
Don't bother - I'm leaving.
But what good am I if I can't do this... this one thing?
Pathetic wizard - of course you needed saving.
I'm supposed to be saving Cal and Lia!

EditorData.NodeContext: frantic, clearly worried for his siblings

Text.Value: A good wizard knows when to ask for guidance - for help.
Shut up, and be grateful I saved your sorry tail.
Gods damn it all. I can do nothing right - not a damn thing.
If it helps, when I re-tell this story, I could say you killed all the monsters?
Who gives a damn about your stories? All I care about is getting my brother and sister back.

EditorData.NodeContext: frantic, clearly worried for his siblings

Text.Value: Yes, there is! I came here to save Cal and Lia!

EditorData.NodeContext: frantic, clearly worried for his siblings

Text.Value: I was looking for Cal and Lia, what else?

EditorData.NodeContext: worried for his siblings, a little frantic

Text.Value: You were outmatched in that fight - there is no shame in that.
Why don't I go with you?
Good luck.
If you ask me really, really nicely I might escort you back.

Synopsis: Players find Rolan in SCL being attacked by the shadows after deciding to go by himself to save his siblings. After the dialog he will return to Haven
